bas:texts.bas:longDescription: Level, radar, contactless. Premium device, 80GHz. Hygienic. Application: liquids, solids. Integrated data memory. :: High availability and accuracy. :: Reliable measuring: for changing medias, pressure, temperatures, gas phases, tanks with many obstacles.
bas:texts.bas:configuration: 010: Approval: CD: CSA C/US XP Cl.I Div.1 Gr.A-D, Cl.II,III Div.1 Gr.E-G, Cl.I Div.2 Gr.A-D, Cl.I zone 0/1, AEx, Ex db IIC T6 Ga/Gb 020: Output: BA: 2-wire 4-20mA HART 030: Display; Operation: D: Segment display w/o buttons + Bluetooth 040: Housing; Material: B: Single compartment; Alu, coated 050: Electrical Connection: H: Thread NPT1/2, IP66/68 NEMA Type 4X/6P 060: Application: J: Process temperature -40…150oC/ -40...302oF 070: Antenna: GN: Cladded flush mount, PTFE, 80mm/3" 105: Process Connection, Sealing Surface: TA: Clamp/Tri-Clamp 110: Process Connection: 3HK: Tri-Clamp ISO2852 DN101.6 (4"), DIN32676 DN100, PTFE>316L, NA-CONNECT compatible 200: Seal: B: PTFE cladded 540: >>Application Package: EH: Heartbeat Verification + Monitoring

bas:texts.bas:longDescription: Level, radar, contactless. Basic device, 80GHz. Application: liquids. :: High availability and accuracy. :: Reliable measuring: for changing medias, pressure, temperatures, gas phases, tanks with many obstacles, tanks with small process connections.
bas:texts.bas:configuration: 010: Approval: CD: CSA C/US XP Cl.I Div.1 Gr.A-D, Cl.II,III Div.1 Gr.E-G, Cl.I Div.2 Gr.A-D, Cl.I zone 0/1, AEx, Ex db IIC T6 Ga/Gb 020: Output: BA: 2-wire 4-20mA HART 030: Display; Operation: D: Segment display w/o buttons + Bluetooth 040: Housing; Material: B: Single compartment; Alu, coated 050: Electrical Connection: H: Thread NPT1/2, IP66/68 NEMA Type 4X/6P 060: Application: H: Process temperature -40…130oC/ -40...266oF 070: Antenna: GA: Drip-off, PTFE 50mm/2" 105: Process Connection, Sealing Surface: A3: Thread ASME B1.20.1, NPT 110: Process Connection: VEJ: MNPT1-1/2, 316L 200: Seal: D: FKM Viton GLT 540: >>Application Package: EH: Heartbeat Verification + Monitoring
